alert.note: Alert for Armstrong; Clarion; Jefferson (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 25 at 4:59PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN JEFFERSON...CENTRAL ARMSTRONG AND SOUTHERN CLARION COUNTIES THROUGH 530 PM EDT... At 459 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of Kittanning, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Rimersburg, New Bethlehem, East Brady, Sligo, Summerville, Limestone, Hawthorn, Corsica, Timblin, Worthville, Templeton, and Distant. This includes Interstate 80 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 67 and 74. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
